name: salvo
content:

the action of firing several guns at the same time, either in a war or in a ceremony: a salvo of guns/rockets
a sudden loud sound made by many people at the same time: Every joke the comedian made was greeted by a salvo of laughter from the audience.
the first part of a speech or the first in a series of actions intended to get a particular result: In his opening salvo the speaker fiercely attacked the government's record on healthcare.
